name: Mutant Pizzas
description:
05/05 - This has been translated to English.

After an experimental test done by scientist unicorns, some pizzas became mutants and decided to look for revenge against humanity for eating them. Now unicorns have to deffend the portal to the human world and prevent Mutant Pizzas from passing through it. Help the unicorns defend the portal that connects them with the human world from the mutant pizzas!

-> If you have difficulty playing a level try playing other levels and get more resources to buy new unicorns and upgrades!

Game made for a college project by:

André Monteiro - Programmer/Animator
Mariana Sousa - Game and UI Designer
Mariana Rafael - Artist
